content: The Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast likes to use punching attacks similar to the Stone Vanguard and the coffin carts. It will perform combos of smashing its fists down and creating pools of lava that will explode. The best way to deal with these is to dodge them or try to hang back from the beast as far as you can.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_5_Secret-Bishui_Cave_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 5 Secret - Bishui Cave Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King - Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast'.
The content is as follows:
The Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast likes to use punching attacks similar to the Stone Vanguard and the coffin carts. It will perform combos of smashing its fists down and creating pools of lava that will explode. The best way to deal with these is to dodge them or try to hang back from the beast as far as you can.
